title: Implement basic index in Rust
description: Implement index.rs: scan and build HashMap. Match Python behavior.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement basic index building in Rust mirroring Python. Acceptance: IssueIndex struct with lookup maps, build_index_from_directory reading JSON files, tests matching Python behavior.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust index module + tests. Ran: cd rust && cargo test
